meta.name: Automated GA4 Analytics Data Backfill to BigQuery with Telegram Alerts

parameters.sqlQuery:
-- This query creates a table for session data by channel group for the specified date range.
-- It then inserts the aggregated data from the corresponding GA4 node.
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_data_session_channel_group_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (
  date DATE,
  sessionDefaultChannelGroup STRING,
  sessions INT64,
  totalUsers INT64,
  newUsers INT64,
  ecommercePurchases INT64,
  purchaseRevenue FLOAT64
);

-- Insert data from the GA4 node.
INSERT INTO `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_data_session_channel_group_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (date, sessionDefaultChannelGroup, sessions, totalUsers, newUsers, ecommercePurchases, purchaseRevenue)
VALUES
{{ $items()[0].json.rows.map(row => `(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', '${row.dimensionValues[0].value}'), '${row.dimensionValues[1].value}', ${row.metricValues[0].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[1].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[2].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[3].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[4].value || 'NULL'})`).join(',') }};

-- Creates and populates a daily table for session data by source, campaign, and medium.
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_data_session_source_campaign_medium_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (
  date DATE,
  sessionSource STRING,
  sessionCampaignName STRING,
  sessionMedium STRING,
  sessions INT64,
  totalUsers INT64,
  newUsers INT64,
  ecommercePurchases INT64,
  purchaseRevenue FLOAT64
);

-- Insert data from the GA4 node.
INSERT INTO `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_data_session_source_campaign_medium_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }}(date, sessionSource, sessionCampaignName, sessionMedium, sessions, totalUsers, newUsers, ecommercePurchases, purchaseRevenue)
VALUES
{{ $items()[0].json.rows.map(row => `(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', '${row.dimensionValues[0].value}'), '${row.dimensionValues[1].value}', '${row.dimensionValues[2].value}', '${row.dimensionValues[3].value}', ${row.metricValues[0].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[1].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[2].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[3].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[4].value || 'NULL'})`).join(',') }};

-- Creates and populates a daily table for user data by country, language, and city.
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_data_country_language_city_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (
  date DATE,
  country STRING,
  language STRING,
  city STRING,
  sessions INT64,
  screenPageViews INT64,
  totalUsers INT64,
  newUsers INT64,
  ecommercePurchases INT64,
  purchaseRevenue FLOAT64
);

-- Insert data from the GA4 node.
INSERT INTO `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_data_country_language_city_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (date, country, language, city, sessions, screenPageViews, totalUsers, newUsers, ecommercePurchases, purchaseRevenue)
VALUES
{{ $items()[0].json.rows.map(row => `(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', '${row.dimensionValues[0].value}'), '${row.dimensionValues[1].value}', '${row.dimensionValues[2].value}', '${row.dimensionValues[3].value}', ${row.metricValues[0].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[1].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[2].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[3].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[4].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[5].value || 'NULL'})`).join(',') }};

-- Creates and populates a daily table for item-specific metrics.
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_data_item_name_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (
  date DATE,
  itemName STRING,
  itemPurchaseQuantity INT64,
  itemRevenue FLOAT64
);

-- Insert data from the GA4 node.
INSERT INTO `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_data_item_name_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }}(date, itemName, itemPurchaseQuantity, itemRevenue)
VALUES
{{ $items()[0].json.rows.map(row => `(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', '${row.dimensionValues[0].value}'), '${row.dimensionValues[1].value}', ${row.metricValues[0].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[1].value || 'NULL'})`).join(',') }};

-- Creates and populates a daily table for technology data (browser, OS, device).
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_data_browser_os_device_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (
  date DATE,
  browser STRING,
  operatingSystem STRING,
  deviceCategory STRING,
  sessions INT64,
  screenPageViews INT64,
  totalUsers INT64,
  newUsers INT64,
  ecommercePurchases INT64,
  purchaseRevenue FLOAT64
);

-- Insert data from the GA4 node.
INSERT INTO `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_data_browser_os_device_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (date, browser, operatingSystem, deviceCategory, sessions, screenPageViews, totalUsers, newUsers, ecommercePurchases, purchaseRevenue)
VALUES
{{ $items()[0].json.rows.map(row => `(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', '${row.dimensionValues[0].value}'), '${row.dimensionValues[1].value}', '${row.dimensionValues[2].value}', '${row.dimensionValues[3].value}', ${row.metricValues[0].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[1].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[2].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[3].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[4].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[5].value || 'NULL'})`).join(',') }};

-- Creates and populates a daily table for first-user acquisition source.
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_data_first_user_source_medium_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (
  date DATE,
  firstUserMedium STRING,
  firstUserSource STRING,
  firstUserCampaignName STRING,
  totalUsers INT64,
  newUsers INT64,
  ecommercePurchases INT64,
  purchaseRevenue FLOAT64
);

-- Insert data from the GA4 node.
INSERT INTO `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_data_first_user_source_medium_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (date, firstUserMedium, firstUserSource, firstUserCampaignName, totalUsers, newUsers, ecommercePurchases, purchaseRevenue)
VALUES
{{ $items()[0].json.rows.map(row => `(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', '${row.dimensionValues[0].value}'), '${row.dimensionValues[1].value}', '${row.dimensionValues[2].value}', '${row.dimensionValues[3].value}', ${row.metricValues[0].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[1].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[2].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[3].value || 'NULL'})`).join(',') }};

-- Creates and populates a daily table for first-user acquisition by channel group.
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_data_first_user_channel_group_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (
  date DATE,
  firstUserDefaultChannelGroup STRING,
  totalUsers INT64,
  newUsers INT64,
  ecommercePurchases INT64,
  purchaseRevenue FLOAT64
);

-- Insert data from the GA4 node.
INSERT INTO `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_data_first_user_channel_group_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (date, firstUserDefaultChannelGroup, totalUsers, newUsers, ecommercePurchases, purchaseRevenue)
VALUES
{{ $items()[0].json.rows.map(row => `(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', '${row.dimensionValues[0].value}'), '${row.dimensionValues[1].value}', ${row.metricValues[0].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[1].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[2].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[3].value || 'NULL'})`).join(',') }};

-- Creates and populates a daily table for advertising performance metrics.
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_ads_data_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (
  date DATE,
  sessionSource STRING,
  sessionMedium STRING,
  sessionCampaignName STRING,
  ecommercePurchases INT64,
  averagePurchaseRevenue FLOAT64,
  purchaseRevenue FLOAT64,
  advertiserAdClicks INT64,
  advertiserAdCost FLOAT64,
  advertiserAdCostPerClick FLOAT64,
  returnOnAdSpend FLOAT64
);

-- Insert data from the GA4 node.
INSERT INTO `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_ads_data_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (date, sessionSource, sessionMedium, sessionCampaignName, ecommercePurchases, averagePurchaseRevenue, purchaseRevenue, advertiserAdClicks, advertiserAdCost, advertiserAdCostPerClick, returnOnAdSpend)
VALUES
{{ $items()[0].json.rows.map(row => `(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', '${row.dimensionValues[0].value}'), '${row.dimensionValues[1].value}', '${row.dimensionValues[2].value}', '${row.dimensionValues[3].value}', ${row.metricValues[0].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[1].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[2].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[3].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[4].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[5].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[6].value || 'NULL'})`).join(',') }};

-- Creates and populates a daily summary table of all key metrics.
-- This version is corrected to match the exact output of the GA4 - All Metrics node.
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_all_metrics_data_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (
  date DATE,
  sessions INT64,
  totalUsers INT64,
  userEngagementDuration FLOAT64,
  newUsers INT64,
  engagementRate FLOAT64,
  engagedSessions INT64,
  screenPageViews INT64,
  purchaseRevenue FLOAT64,
  ecommercePurchases INT64
);

-- Insert data from the GA4 node with the correct metric mapping.
INSERT INTO `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_all_metrics_data_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (date, sessions, totalUsers, userEngagementDuration, newUsers, engagementRate, engagedSessions, screenPageViews, purchaseRevenue, ecommercePurchases)
VALUES
{{ $items()[0].json.rows.map(row => `(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', '${row.dimensionValues[0].value}'), ${row.metricValues[0].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[1].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[2].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[3].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[4].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[5].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[6].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[7].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[8].value || 'NULL'})`).join(',') }};

-- Creates and populates a daily table for event-specific metrics.
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_event_metrics_data_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (
  date DATE,
  eventName STRING,
  eventCount INT64,
  eventCountPerUser FLOAT64,
  eventValue FLOAT64
);

-- Insert data from the GA4 node.
INSERT INTO `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_event_metrics_data_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (date, eventName, eventCount, eventCountPerUser, eventValue)
VALUES
{{ $items()[0].json.rows.map(row => `(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', '${row.dimensionValues[0].value}'), '${row.dimensionValues[1].value}', ${row.metricValues[0].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[1].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[2].value || 'NULL'})`).join(',') }};

-- Creates and populates a daily table for metrics by page location.
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_page_location_data_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (
  date DATE,
  pageLocation STRING,
  totalUsers INT64,
  ecommercePurchases INT64,
  purchaseRevenue FLOAT64,
  screenPageViews INT64,
  eventCount INT64,
  engagementRate FLOAT64
);

-- Insert data from the GA4 node.
INSERT INTO `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_page_location_data_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (date, pageLocation, totalUsers, ecommercePurchases, purchaseRevenue, screenPageViews, eventCount, engagementRate)
VALUES
{{ $items()[0].json.rows.map(row => `(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', '${row.dimensionValues[0].value}'), '${row.dimensionValues[1].value}', ${row.metricValues[0].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[1].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[2].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[3].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[4].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[5].value || 'NULL'})`).join(',') }};

-- This query first creates a new table for the specified date range, replacing it if it already exists.
-- Then, it inserts the transaction data passed from the previous n8n node.
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_transaction_items_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (
  date DATE,
  transactionId STRING,
  itemName STRING,
  itemPurchaseQuantity INT64,
  itemRevenue FLOAT64
);

-- Insert data from the GA4 node into the newly created table.
INSERT INTO `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_transaction_items_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (date, transactionId, itemName, itemPurchaseQuantity, itemRevenue)
VALUES
{{ $items()[0].json.rows.map(row => `(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', '${row.dimensionValues[2].value}'), '${row.dimensionValues[0].value}', '${row.dimensionValues[1].value}', ${row.metricValues[0].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[1].value || 'NULL'})`).join(',') }};

-- Creates and populates a daily table for landing page performance metrics.
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_landing_page_data_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (
  date DATE,
  landingPage STRING,
  totalUsers INT64,
  sessions INT64,
  eventCount INT64,
  ecommercePurchases INT64,
  engagementRate FLOAT64,
  purchaseRevenue FLOAT64
);

-- Insert data from the GA4 node.
INSERT INTO `{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.project_id }}`.`{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.dataset_id }}`.ga4_landing_page_data_{{ $('Backfill Config').item.json.startDate.replaceAll('-', '') }} (date, landingPage, totalUsers, sessions, eventCount, ecommercePurchases, engagementRate, purchaseRevenue)
VALUES
{{ $items()[0].json.rows.map(row => `(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', '${row.dimensionValues[0].value}'), '${row.dimensionValues[1].value}', ${row.metricValues[0].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[1].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[2].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[3].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[4].value || 'NULL'}, ${row.metricValues[5].value || 'NULL'})`).join(',') }};

parameters.content:
# 🚀 N8N GA4 Backfill Workflow

## Automate your GA4 Backfilling!

This workflow fetches key reports from Google Analytics 4 and loads them into Google BigQuery, complete with status alerts.

### 📋 How to Use

**1. Configure Workflow ⚙️**
- Open the **Backfill Config** node.
- Set your `project_id`, `dataset_id`, date range, and `GA4 Property ID`.

**2. Set Credentials 🔑**
- Authenticate your Google Analytics and Google BigQuery accounts in one of each type of node.
- Set up your Telegram credentials and Chat ID in the final **Telegram** node.

**3. Run the Workflow ▶️**
- Activate the workflow to run on its schedule via the **Schedule Trigger**, or run it manually at any time.

---

*For detailed instructions, questions, or more information, please visit the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/aliasoblomov/N8N-GA4-Backfill-Workflow).*
